profile_circle_info_dialog: You need to join a circle first to perform this operation.
allow_send_notification_tips: Allow sending notifications to others. When enabled, when you send messages, notification events will be sent to XChat push server containing the recipient's pubkey and relay information
allow_receive_notification_tips: Allow receiving message push notifications. When enabled, your device ID will be sent to XChat push server. Disabling will delete your device ID from the push server
notification_setting_failed: Failed to update notification settings. Please check your network connection and try again.
sign_out_dialog_content: Make sure you've backed up your private key. Otherwise, you risk losing access to your account.
refresh_user_profile_success: उपयोगकर्ता प्रोफ़ाइल सफलतापूर्वक अपडेट किया गया
refresh_user_profile_failed: उपयोगकर्ता प्रोफ़ाइल अपडेट करने में विफल
refresh_profile_from_relay_confirm: यह आपकी नवीनतम प्रोफ़ाइल जानकारी प्राप्त करने के लिए सार्वजनिक रिले से कनेक्ट होगा। कनेक्शन अस्थायी होगा और उपयोग के बाद स्वचालित रूप से बंद हो जाएगा।
refresh_user_profile_from_relay_confirm: यह इस उपयोगकर्ता की नवीनतम प्रोफ़ाइल जानकारी प्राप्त करने के लिए सार्वजनिक रिले से कनेक्ट होगा। कनेक्शन अस्थायी होगा और उपयोग के बाद स्वचालित रूप से बंद हो जाएगा।
str_nip96_tips_text: The file server does not support NIP-96
delete_circle_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete this circle and cannot be undone. All your data within this circle, including chat messages and other related data, will be irreversibly lost.
qr_generation_failed: QR code generation failed, please try again
one_time_keypackage_confirm_content: Generate a one-time link that can only be used once
permanent_keypackage_confirm_content: Generate a permanent link and publish it to circle relay, can be used multiple times
regenerate_confirm_content: This will generate a new keypackage
delete_account_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete your account and local data, including messages and media. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
